headline: Deutsche Bank cuts Chubb rating on ’slowing growth and peaking margins’
summary: Investing.com -- Deutsche Bank downgraded Chubb (NYSE:CB) to Hold from Buy on Tuesday, warning that the insurer’s recent outperformance may not continue amid signs of deteriorating fundamentals and softening market conditions.

headline: Chubb rejigs investment and asset management leadership
summary: The company named Tim Boroughs as executive chairman of asset management, while Chris Hogan will succeed Boroughs as CIO.
